body.p:
Lebanon Ky
Sept 30" 1865
Gov T. E. Bramlet,
Dr Sir
The death of Jubal Morgan (former Magistrate). has caused a vacancy in the Haysville district No 1 in this county. (Marion) for the office of Justice of the peace.

I would very respectifully recommend to your Hon that Q M Chandler of said District is a very good man and well qualified for the position. -- No one seems Inclined to want It but I think that he will accept It if you will do him the honor to appoint him.
Our court of claims will meet in a short time & I desire a ful Board, Therefore by giving this your Immediate atteintion you will very much oblige

Your very most
servt
R A Burton P. J. M. C
If you send commission direct to me or Co Clk.

Marion Co
Justice Peace
Q. M. Chandler
apptd 3d Oct/65
